subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[four]]
# {{lb|zh|music}} [[la]] (''musical note'')
# {{lb|zh|printing}} [[English]]; The [[size]] of [[type]] between [[小四]] ([[little]] [[4]]) and [[小三]] ([[little]] [[3]]), [[standardize]]d as 14 [[point]].

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: As superstition, {{ltc-l|四}} is {{w|Numbers in Chinese culture#Four|avoided}} because it is similar to {{ltc-l|死|death}} in sound.

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Derived terms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|四%捨%五%入|し%しゃ%ご%にゅう}}: rounding (fractions)
* {{ja-r|四%則%演%算|し%そく%えん%ざん}}: the four basic [[arithmetic]] [[operations]]
* {{ja-r|四%天%王|し%てん%のう}}: the [[w:Four Heavenly Kings|Four Heavenly Kings]] ([[Buddhism]])
* {{ja-r|四%面%楚歌|し%めん%そか}}: facing hostility, difficulty, or frustration on all sides

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text: Native {{m|ja|四|tr=yo||four}} + ''n'', influenced by analogy by the final sound in Chinese {{m|zh|三|tr=san||three}}.

subSections.text:
